extendedInfo.description: Welcome to SMS Forwarder Pro!SMS Forwarder Pro allows you to easily and securely forward incoming and outgoing text messages to another email or phone. With a ton of customization features and functions, SMS Forwarder Pro is the most feature rich SMS forwarder application for Android and the only one offering a premium, secure, extremely reliable and instant forwarding service to email. Forwarded messages are encrypted using strong AES CBC encryption.No need for complicated configurations, just set the email address or phone number you want your texts to be forwarded to and you're set. You specify multiple addresses and numbers too!SMS Forwarder Pro has been completely re-written from scratch and is not more reliable than ever. New features are introduced such as the ability to remotely enable or disable forwarding, and other features are now working a lot better. androidappreview.com gave SMS Forwarder Pro the editors choice award in their recent review: "SMS Forwarder Pro earns a full recommendation from us here at Android Apps Review. The app is a power-punch for the right user, and with killer tech support rolled into the mix, your days of wondering exactly what was said to whom are officially over."You can forward messages and include information such as GPS position and contact information, and much more. Best of all, its encrypted! == FAQ ==* Outgoing messages are not being forwarded** If outgoing messages are not being forwarded make sure of the following:*** No task killers! Task killers have no effect with Android and should never be used. They do more harm than good.**** Make sure any third party SMS app is set to use Android's sms systemIf it still doesnt work, please feel free to contact support using the help button in the app.You can expect first rate customer support. If you are unhappy with anything or just want to throw in a suggestion for new features, please do so and I will be happy to do my best to make the necessary improvements.Enjoy!Not sure if its any good? Remember that you can download it and try it for 15 minutes free of charge.Want to get an early taste of the next version of SMS Forwarder Pro? Join the Google+ Community and you'll get the chance to get the beta version: https://plus.google.com/communities/107139402974762042187keywords; sms forwarding, sms to email, send sms to email

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: Easy to setup, simply to activate. Just what I needed to forward my sms to an alternate phone when I\'m out running. Would also like a feature to enable / disable call forwarding to the same number as sms, would save me a separate step.
reviews.author: Craig Schmitt

reviews.title: Does what it sets out to
reviews.comment: Still hoping on a widget tho.   5 stars with working widget
reviews.author: Thomas Charlesworth

reviews.title: Great tech support!
reviews.comment: I inquired about the ability to automatically forward to a group. Within hours the feature was added and worked like a charm. Thanks, Edvard - especially for your patience in helping me.
reviews.author: Cathy Skvorak

reviews.title: Cyrillic font issue
reviews.comment: When forwarding SMS in Cyrillic font - the result is unreadable. Are you going to fix it? Otherwise it works fine on HTC.
reviews.author: Denis Timofeev

reviews.title: bug after phone restart or off
reviews.comment: forwarding outgoing messages wont work after phone restart or turning off the phone and turning on again, please fix that bug and i will give 5 stars, I\'m using samsung S4, nice app dev i like it  edit: Still not fix in Phone To Phone SMS outgoing forward, when i restart my phone, sms outgoing won\'t automatically turn on, only incoming is working, i need to re-enable outgoing sms whenever i restart my phone, hope this info helps, Thanks
reviews.author: Knine Crow

reviews.title: Does not forward outbound on galaxy.  Tech support non-existent
reviews.comment: Don\'t buy
reviews.author: Marvin Cole

reviews.comment: Does exactly what it is supposed to do
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money
reviews.comment: Very unreliable on my Samsung SAMSUNG-SGH-I727. Rarely forwards outgoing messages. I opened a ticket with the help desk over a week after I bought/installed the app and still have not heard a response back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget access?
reviews.comment: App works great, I don\'t know what other customers are doing. However, you guys need to fix the widget access for more convience
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Support
reviews.comment: I had a small issue that I couldn\'t figure out myself by looking in the settings. I contacted the developer on a Sunday and got a response within hours. By the next day he had found the issue and was working on a fix.  If you have problems with an app don\'t shoot the developers straight away, work with them. Make app development sustainable. (I\'m not a developer)  Thanks SMS Forwarder!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Its working great now! Forwarding all my messages.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same problem as others.........doesn\'t work well.
reviews.comment: Same problem as others.........doesn\'t work well. It is forwarding the incoming SMS but not the outgoing SMS messages. I have purchased two of this app cause I needed it on two different phones and both phones have the app installed on on the phone memory and not a SD card like the tip says to do but it still only sends the outgoing SMS messages. Also after putting in my password and the app opens to turn it on or off but there is no way to get back into the set up menu to change our options, I have to uninstall and reinstall it just to change something.   Can someone please tell me when these things will be fixed? Or how to fix them? I have emailed the company weeks ago and have heard nothing back about it as of today.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung captivate
reviews.comment: Epic fail....first and last time I Will pay for an app...it doesn\'t work at all!!!! If I could give negative stars I would..emailed developer no response! Would love a refund!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not do what I purchased it for.
reviews.comment: I bought this strictly so I could forward my outgoing texts. When I enable the feature, it only forwards the very first one I send. Then stops forwarding. A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY! Absolute garbage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I purchased it already, why is the link now disabled? Why should I have to purchase it twice? What happened to the original purchase?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Works great. I use this to keep email copies of texts from clients authorizing me to do work or tenants agreeing to things.  Occasionally it puts an icon in notification bar saying it\'s working, but most of the time it does not. I am okay with not, or the option to see it or not. Great app,  thanks!
reviews.author: Lee Smith

reviews.comment: Best SMS Forwarder for Android out there! Pretty sure Ive tried them all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only works when it feels like it
reviews.comment: I struggled with this application on my T mobile Galaxy S2 running Gingerbread for months.  It never forwarded outgoing messages and only forwarded incoming messages occasionally (never when on WiFi).  Tried customer service and just got a canned answer about turning off private mode forwarding (which wasn\'t on).  In summary a complete waste of time and money.  Uninstalled this app and installed SMS Forwarding by Tony Shen.  This doesn\'t forward outgoing messages either, but at least it does reliably forward incoming messages (even on WiFi) and it is free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Works great with nice interface.
reviews.author: Dwreck Herndon

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Don\'t use of waist your money
reviews.author: Glendon Probus
